About

tweetbot

December 11, 2011

About six months ago, Tweetbot came to my attention–probably via the B&B Podcast (though i’m not sure which B it was). Tweetbot was a breath of fresh air from the official Twitter client.

It has a number of very powerful differentiators:

  • able to view a conversation thread with a simple right-to-left swipe.
  • able to view replies to a tweet with a left-to-right swipe.
  • able to switch between your timeline with your lists.

at any rate, Tweetbot is currently on sale for $1 (regularly $2.99). At either price, it’s a great investment.
